title: Rangnick: No need to strip Maguire of captaincy despite 'weaker moments'

title: Bruce's first WBA home game ends in stalemate

Steve Bruce's first home game in charge of West Brom ended in a 0-0 draw

title: Cancelo opens up about 'horrific' home assault
shortDescription: Joao Cancelo has opened up about the "horrific" home invasion in which he was assaulted at the end of December and says it has deeply affected his family.

title: Trippier fractures metatarsal | 'It's frustrating but I'll stay positive'

title: Nev: Man Utd's problems not down to the manager anymore
